pr_title: Fixes exception in preview using regexp search and regexp search without specified field

timeline.bodyText: Since / terminates the JavaScript regexp, it should be escaped. The issue with using new RegExp is that you will have to escape the string terminator instead, so it is more code without any benefit that I am aware of.
